data.title: All the Spider-Man Games
data.text:
You play the webslinging wonder as you climb a building while dodging the Green Goblin and his goons.

Spiderman's girl, Mary Jane, in trouble as the evil Mysterio kidnaps her and takes her to his hideout, Rockwell Studios. To save her, Spider-Man must navigate through various environments and puzzles, representing Mysterio's obsession with film.

You control Spider-Man as you race against time tracking down an nuclear bomb set by the Kingpin.

Side scrolling platform action video game in which Spider-Man's enemies have discovered his secret identity and kidnapped his wife, Mary Jane. Spider-Man then battles Mysterio, Hobgoblin, Scorpion, Rhino, Doctor Octopus and Venom.

Spider-Man must battle various supervillains to obtain the keys needed to disarm a nuclear bomb that the Kingpin plans to detonate within twenty-four hours.

Side-scrolling beat 'em up game based on a 14-part Marvel comic book crossover featuring Spider-Man and Venom who team up with a host of other superheroes to face Venom's murderous offspring Carnage and his team of super-villains.

The amazing Spider-Man is in serious trouble; the Kingpin has vowed to destroy New York and he's assembled a vast army of villains to help him. Now it's up to Spider-Man to stop him for good.

When Thanos has posession of the Infinity Gems, Marvel heroes and villains attempt to recover the Gems for their own reasons.

Marvel Comics Spider-Man: The Sinister Six features the wall-crawling superhero Spider-Man, trying to defeat six of his arch-enemies, The Sinister Six: Dr. Octopus, Hobgoblin, Shocker, Chameleon, Mysterio, and Vulture. The player will control both Spider-Man and his alter-ego Peter Parker.

You play as Captain America, Iron Man, Hulk, Spider-Man, or Wolverine as you to seek out the Infinity Gems before they fall into the wrong hands.

The evil Onslaught has become too powerful, so the Marvel universe is assisted by the Capcom universe to destroy him before he is unstoppable.

Framed by Dr. Octopus, you must help Spider-Man clear his name and save the city.

A pirate-woman named Ruby-Heart who united fifty-two of the Earth's strongest heroes and villains, transports them to another dimension on her enormous battleship to fight an evil shape-shifter named Abyss who wants to rule all realities.

Shortly after the defeat of Doctor Octopus and his symbiont army from the previous game, super-villain Electro attacks New York using high powered weaponry that'll turn him into a god, leaving Spider-Man to save the day.

Peter Parker promises Mary Jane to get a bowl for her goldfish, but gets involved in stopping a crimewave as Spider-Man - Hammerhead, the Big Wheel, Electro, the Rhino and the Scorpion are causing chaos in New York City, in a grand scheme devised by criminal mastermind Mysterio.

In this game loosely based on the film, Spider-Man is on a mission to fight evil in the forms of the villains Shocker, Vulture, Scorpion, and the Green Goblin.

Spider-Man/Peter Parker struggles between his personal life which involves Mary Jane Watson and his superhero life where he joins up with a vigilante known as Black Cat battling a series of foes including the mad Doc Ock.
